measured_by: distance in pixels between a participant’s selection and the target mean (relative to the non-target)
justification: "Selection bias was measured as the distance, in pixels, between a selection and the target mean on a trial".

measured_by: time between stimulus offset and the first mouse movement (movement onset)
justification: "Reaction time was recorded at the first mouse movement detected after stimulus offset."

measured_by: total time from movement onset to the release of the mouse button
justification: "the time between stimulus offset and movement onset, as well as total movement time were recorded for every completed trial".

measured_by: peak velocity of the mouse cursor during each selection
justification: "we computed the maximum ... velocity of the mouse cursor movements during selections on each trial."

measured_by: average velocity of the mouse cursor during each selection
justification: "we computed the ... average velocity of the mouse cursor movements during selections on each trial."
